cta.text: BUY ONE, GET ONE FREE TODAY!

promptVars.product: a black jar of PURE SHILAJIT GUMMIES held in one hand with the label facing the camera

comment.text: as a 61 year old man this stuff right here is like youth in a bottle... i will be a customer for the rest of my life!
